personal.name: Gautam Raj
personal.description: I like building cool stuff, exploring new tech, and contributing wherever I can — whether it's freelance gigs or open-source projects.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I'm Gautam — I enjoy building things in front of a screen. I've worked on several personal and freelance projects, and I'm always eager to learn and grow. I'm open to collaborations, freelance opportunities, and full-time or part-time roles.

projects.title: Legal Blogs
projects.description: A full-stack web application for blogging using the MERN(MongoDB, ExpressJs, ReactJs,Typescript, NodeJs) stack.

projects.title: AI Notes Generator
projects.description: A Generative AI Notes App made using Google Gemini API. Upload PDF file and generate notes from it.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained a health sector startup, implementing real-time chat and video call features with WebSockets.
Used Redux for state management and API integration, improving application performance.
Enhanced the web app's UI for a better user experience.
Collaborated with the backend team to integrate APIs into the frontend using React.
Improved the scalability of the product by optimizing React component rendering.
Implemented automated unit tests using Jest to ensure the robustness of the application.
Designed user-friendly interfaces for mobile and web applications using Figma.
Collaborated with the development team to ensure smooth handoff and implementation of designs.
Conducted user research and usability testing to improve the overall user experience.
